mapper.insert: insert into reservation (store_seq, user_id, number_of_people, coupon, reservation_time, reservation_status, reservation_comment) values (#{store_seq}, #{user_id}, #{number_of_people}, #{coupon}, #{reservation_time}, #{reservation_status}, #{reservation_comment})
mapper.select: select store_seq, reservation_time, reservation_date, people from reservation_left where store_seq=#{seq}
